title: ‘New York, New York,’ a Film-Inspired Homage, Plans Broadway Bow
description: The new musical, based on the 1977 Martin Scorsese film, features songs by John Kander and Fred Ebb and is directed by Susan Stroman.
dc:creator: Michael Paulson
media:credit: From left: Evan Agostini/Getty Images; Jamie McCarthy/Getty Images
media:description: The musical will include songs by John Kander, and will be directed and choreographed by Susan Stroman.
